sense.def:
To cherish a hope or memory
pomeni imeti v mislih neko upanje ali spomin, ki nas razveseljuje.

seg.quote: I cherish a hope that one day we will be reunited.

sense.def:
To cherish someone
pomeni do nekoga čutiti ljubečo privrženost.

seg.quote: Comfort and cherish those you love.

sense.def:
To cherish a right or a privilege
pomeni, da sta neka pravica ali privilegij za nas pomembna in se trudimo, da bi ju ohranili.

seg.quote: Can he preserve the values he cherishes?
One of our cherished privileges is the right of free speech.
